price: 68. »¡Señor!, duplícales el castigo y expúlsalos sin piedad de Tu misericordia».
arabic: رَبَّنَآ ءَاتِهِمۡ ضِعۡفَيۡنِ مِنَ ٱلۡعَذَابِ وَٱلۡعَنۡهُمۡ لَعۡنٗا كَبِيرٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: rabbanā ātihim ḍiʿ'fayni mina al-ʿadhābi wal-ʿanhum laʿnan kabīran
